title: Game Character Thug Boss
description: Enlist a soviet thug in your next game audio production with our Game Character Russian Thug voice library.
longDescription:
Audio Demo


Enlist a soviet thug in your next game audio production with our Game Character Thug Boss voice library featuring a deep, confident, cocky collection of designed human voice over sound files created for realistic games & trailers. This voice-over sound library features an accented gangster, male antagonist game character inspired by the gremlin’s eastern mafia 


  • 374 male voice-over audio files
  • 525 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44bit/16k .wav file format


Game Character Thug Boss voiceover sound library provides you with more than 370+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, fighting and pain sounds, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, character, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences. 


The Thugs' voice profile is heavy, deep, warm with a pronounced Voka induced vocal performance. He is perfect for a mob boss, hitman, gangster, criminal, in-game non-player characters. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with your own vocals effects and processing.


UCS Compliant


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and is organized into categories to make it super easy to navigate to the right sounds. With 370+ voice over audio files and 143 custom dialogue lines such as “For The Motherland, Yuri Fetch Me The Vodka, & Run Little Rabbit Run”. This pack has plenty of options to help your game characters come to life. 


Game Character Thug Boss voice over sound effects is not only packed with high-quality voice recordings but includes thought out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations to help you build dynamic western stories, game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments and so much more. 


Product details:

  • 374 male voice-over audio files
  • 525 MB of voice samples
  • All in 16bit/44k .wav file format
  • 11 minutes of game ready & optimized audio
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata
  • Universal Category System (UCS) compliant
  • AAA Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for NPC, antagonist characters, criminal, mafia, action & adventure
  • 10 battle screams, cries & sayings
  • 133 stock NPC dialogue lines
  • 143 custom character specific dialogue lines
  • 11 crying - sad, groan, regret, dying
  • 17 jumping sounds
  • 13 male laughing sounds
  • 23 pain grunts and vocalizations
  • 24 fighting efforts
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • All Royalty Free & YouTube friendly
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
